title: Vir Biotechnology, Digital World Acquisition, Apple: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Apple shares are slipping ahead of the open; Vir Biotechnology said its Covid-19 treatment had been successful in a study
body:
U.S. stock futures were mixed, suggesting markets were set for another seesaw day driven by uncertainty regarding the potential impact of the Omicron Covid-19 variant. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s trading session:
Write to Caitlin Ostroff at caitlin.ostroff@wsj.com
